website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed slats-plus-frame design. Particularly good for full-sized beds that run small.
pros: Sturdy design when assembled that doesn’t slide around
cons: On the small side for an average full bed

customer_reviews.title: Fits Ikea Malm bed. Good for memory foam mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review things, but I just enjoyed this so much. I bought it to replace the flexible Ikea slats on my Malm bed. Memory foam mattresses work better with non flexible slats. They fit perfectly into the bed frame. The assembly was simple and easy. Just a pleasant product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chen

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally got a low profile bed frame lately and comes only three slats which means a box spring is required. I ordered Zinus 1.6" just to give it enough support but not too high off the ground. Delivered fast and great quality, can't wait to sleep on it after the mattress comes full grown
customer_reviews.author: Niko417

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a queen size and it almost seems like a Full
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a queen size and it almost seems like a Full. If it weren't for the original bed slates holding it in place, this wouldn't even work for a queen size. Its a solid solution but the size seems a few inches off all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical/apprehensive about this product. I bought to replace my daughter's box spring she had to discard due to creepy crawlies. First, the item works perfectly well with a normal, innerspring mattress. Second, a breeze to assemble. And, this is really good, to dis-assemble. So if you are likely to move, much easier to transport than a traditional box spring. Third, not friendly to the aforementioned creepy crawlies; no cavity for them to nest (yuck to even think about!) Also not a collector of dust bunnies or any other allergens. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lynniegurrl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to a box spring
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alternative to a box spring. Easy to assemble and keeps my mattress low for my dogs to easily jump into bed
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect specs and poor product.  Product does not fit a queen bed!
customer_reviews.text: False advertising, with no updates on specs. Product is not a queen size fit. Several reviews dating back years and vendor is seems has not updated or revised the specs. Shame on vendor and Amazon for not taking action. Utterly a waste of time and cost / expense.
customer_reviews.author: Ther @city

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT RETURN
customer_reviews.text: These measurements were off (twins) and I ordered TWO and then realized they are NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN. Be careful when ordering! They seem like a great product if they fit your bed, but beware, bc if not perfect you will be stuck with a loss of significant money!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B Sterner

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This was probably the easiest item I've ever put together. The screws come with the bolts on them ready to go. So nicely packaged. Very impressed. The velcro to hold the slats down is a nice feature too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B

customer_reviews.title: Great for memory foam mattresses, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a foundation for my memory mattress (Nectar). I ordered a bed frame without realizing there were not enough slats to properly support the mattress. This was super easy to assemble, I am a 24 yr old 150 lb female and I was able to do it myself!!! So far, very supportive! Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet. Broke bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: This broke my bed frame it was slightly small for it but I was assured it would work. I put it together and slept on it maybe five times and when I got on the side of my bed today, it slid into the side of my bed frame and cracked the whole left side of the thing
customer_reviews.author: tsunamibomb

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to lower the height of our bed for our older dog and it's terrible! It creeks and we felt like it was dipping down in the middle. Also, you can't return it!!!! So we're out the money on this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the Zinus 14 Inch Classic Metal Platform Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I thought the slats for the Zinus 14 Inch Classic Metal Platform Bed Frame with Steel Slat Support, Mattress Foundation, Queen were too spaced out, and the foam mattress would start to get shaped in weird ways. I thought the wood slats would offer more support. It doesn't fit inside the Zinus 14 inch queen frame however. Only left 1 stars because of the return policy which is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Muss. No Fuss. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got home from work & built this bunkie in under 30 mins., including unpacking, reviewing instructions, moving mattress & setting up. 2-day fast delivery, easy to install & light enough for me to set up. I don’t have experience installing any type of furniture but my 14 yr old niece can set this thing up on her own. Not sure what all the fuss is about. It fit my full size ikea bed just fine** no noise. No movement. Loved the Hello & Thank You notes. Cannot remember the last time any company provided such Profession courtesy to their customers. Thank You Zinus.
customer_reviews.author: DianaR

customer_reviews.title: This system is not 74 inches wide. This system ...
customer_reviews.text: This system is not 74 inches wide. This system fell through the bedrails to the floor. It also took them almost a month to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBabe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very high quality and well engineered. Assembly is easy and takes 8 screws. Sturdy, works perfect. Fits good right inside existing metal bed frame. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Kenczyk

customer_reviews.title: it is useless, will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a king size for my king size sleigh bed, it doesn't fit, about an inch or more too small on both sides, it is useless, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Room & Board bed that while visual appealing, had these horrible metal slats that constantly slide around to the point where this became a bed of second choice. We finally ordered the Bunky board via Prime. There was a few days delay with delivery - don't ask me why this went USPS, it's heavy and took a few extra days to actually show up at our home - but then I quickly assembled it, vacuumed under the bed, and put it on the frame; a perfect fit! Fantastic support, makes the mattress feel like new. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product DID NOT FIT our king sized bed as ...
customer_reviews.text: This product DID NOT FIT our king sized bed as it should have 3 inches width short!!! Read another viewers comment & they add 2x4 to the bed do that it would fit. We did the same since customer service NEVER responded & hung up on me numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: As others have stated it slides around a bit. ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated it slides around a bit. It wasn't clear to me when reading the reviews, but it's the frame itself slides on what ever it is on top of. This can be remedied, but it's true a little slippery.
customer_reviews.author: T C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended - solid, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a roughly 6 ft long box - perfect. Easy to follow assembly instructions. Easy to assemble - you don't need any additional tools, fit perfectly on my queen bed. It seems to provide just the right kind of support for a latex/foam mattress. The frame is robust metal all the way around. The slats are about 5/8" thick and fit about 3" apart. This is a very solid piece, and really better than I expected. I highly recommend this as support for a latex/foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rita S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter. Smaller is sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: This is well constructed and I would reccomend it if you have an existing bed frame with center supports. I ordered it without taking it into mind. So putting it into our log frame bed wasn't the best choice. There are no center supports so it sags in the middle. The frame is a queen so its just too wide to not have a center support system. We put a full one in a frame and it works fine. There probably should be a warning or something like that so you order accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's bed is a convertible crib that has been converted to its final form (full size). We had a low profile box spring under her mattress but it was still just too tall, requiring a step stool to get in and out of bed. I finally decided to look for a flatter alternative to her box spring to reduce some of the height and stumbled upon this. It's perfect. Setup was a breeze, instructions were simple, and everything was numbered to ensure you were lining it up correctly. I'm very happy with it and so is my little one!
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Queen

customer_reviews.title: Caution - does not provide adequate support for memory foam mattresses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago and the wooden slats have weakened to the point it could no longer properly support the mattress. This caused a sinking sensation. I initially thought I needed a new mattress. $4,500 later I realized the problem was not my tempurpedic but this bunkie board. I attempted to make a warranty claim but the company has not been cooperative and I have received a measly $5 promo credit from Amazon. Do not make the same mistake I did and purchase a quality support for your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: IN

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly and is the perfect height for the bed we made
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because our bed was too tall with box springs. It fits perfectly and is the perfect height for the bed we made. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Too Small, Too Many Pieces, and Complicated To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The length of this frame measures 77" long and my queen bed is 80" long (as all queen beds usually are) so it's too small. Also came in several pieces, even the wood slats are in 2 pieces! And you need to use tape to keep your mattress in place. It's very complicated to try to assemble and you need a LOT of space to do it. I can't even put it together because I don't have any space to do this. I didn't know it was unassembled, it looked so solid in the pictures and nowhere in the description does it say you need to assemble it. Waste of money. Returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Plum

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble, very few parts, very simple instructions. It took about 5 minutes to put together by myself, and I'm a small female. It's sturdy/good quality, and it's great with the 12" memory foam queen mattress we just got.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: The Smartest Assembly Instructions I've EVER Seen!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I panicked when I opened the box and found something to be assembled. (I generally don't do well with assembling stuff.) I took a deep breath and sat down to peruse the directions and realized it would be okay. I did have a little difficulty getting one corner of the frame to come together, but by standing it upright the resistant piece did what I wanted. Twenty minutes later, I was smiling and gazing proudly at my installed bunkie board. It supports my foam mattress perfectly on my full size wrought iron bed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off!
customer_reviews.text: I measured my bed multiple times, and compared the width to the width of this bunkie board. They should have been a perfect fit, but as others have complained, this item is off by about an inch. Luckily I had slats for the bed, so I was able to utilize this as best as I could. I put the slats down, but the bunkie board on top, and it works. Not what I paid for though. Would have returned, but too much trouble. Do not purchase, unless the ledge that your bed frame has is longer the an inch wide to support the board.
customer_reviews.author: T. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Too small for king bed frame
customer_reviews.text: The product is not wide enough to balance on the supports of a king-sized bed frame. We had to buy lumber and modify the bed frame in order for the bunkie board to have support on both sides. Otherwise, it would just fall off the bed frame on one side. The product seems sturdy and well-made. Very disappointing, though, that they skimped on materials and made it too small to fit a king-sized frame.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to find the perfect thing for my son's full bed, and bunkie boards were so flimsy and cost almost the same as this. It was easy to put together, works perfectly in the frame and is so durable! My son is a rough and tumble kid and we haven't had any problems with this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this bed slat order
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write a review about packaging, but Zinus did a great job with the boxing. Mine came with a goofy hex ratchet, which was awesome for my 3 year old when we were done. (And I'm sure it'll rock on the next furniture assembly) and it was compact enough for 100lb me to carry it up and down stairs. As for the frame, it's as expected in size, was easy to assemble, Velcro bed slats are totally convenient, and it fit perfectly in my son's bunk bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Alison J. Gong

customer_reviews.title: Stick with IKEA products
customer_reviews.text: We have a standard king (Not a California King) low profile bed. We started to assemble the items realized the 2 pieces that are shown on the directions to go at the head and foot of the bed were way too short. Thankfully my boyfriend is a fabricator and was able to modify the 2 side rails and use those at the head and foot of the bed. Then he had to modify the center rail to make it work with the modifications. Several hours later we still don’t have in completely assembled and it’s about to go into trash where it should have gone to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution as a base mattress alternative!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use in place of a regular base mattress to give our bed a “platform” look and to be able to see more of our headboard. We found the directions to be right on and assembly was very easy. Definitely recommend not unfolding the slats before placing on the frame but rather fold as you place them as the velcro is SUPER sticky and makes adjusting pretty challenging. We’ve been using it now for 3 months and have no complaints. 10 out of 10 recommend and will buy again if/when needed!
customer_reviews.author: anna c.

customer_reviews.title: **BE PREPARED FOR SIZE ISSUES** ordered a queen size - too small to fit my queen bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product so much. It came in a timely manner, it was very easy to assemble. It was difficult to remove my mattress and box spring to replace my original (crap!) IKEA slat system. I put in the Zinus slat replacement product and could tell right away it was too small width (left to right) and sure enough, my mattress fell in on the left side within 60 seconds. Second night, I went to roll over to go to the bathroom at 2am, mattress fell into the frame. Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but note metal on metal squeaks
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, because I like a lower bed. Super easy to assemble and it’s well made. However there are two things to point out: first, if you already have a headboard then it’s likely that this will cause your mattress to sit lower than the headboard due to being considerably lower than a box spring. I knew this would happen, but still worth noting. Second, because the outside of this frame is metal, when you place it inside your existing metal frame you’ll find it occasionally squeaks and you’ll have to adjust it or add felt lining to prevent this. This is only an issue when/if you find yourself doing anything that may make a bed shake.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great "buckie board" but slippery
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and tools were supplied. Parts were clean and packaged well. They even put plastic bags around the white Styrofoam pads (which can be a nightmare when they break apart). Wish they had put a rubberized strip along bottom to keep it from sliding and/or covered it the whole thing with cloth. It will probably hurt your hands when you tuck the sheets/blankets between mattress and bunkie board. My board sits on top of my old box spring so it moves when you lean against (queen size) bed. Included awesome ratchet tool was great except hex bit is slightly smaller than hex bolt so you have to wiggle it loose when bolt is tight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reese

customer_reviews.title: sizing is not perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. However, slats are 3.5" apart (too wide for a latex matress) and the frame is bigger than the boxspring.
customer_reviews.author: Libbs

customer_reviews.title: Measure your space before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard queen sleigh bed. A box spring fits the bed fine, and it used to have one. Replaced it with this bunkie board kit but I had to modify the railing of the bed for it to fit. It was too narrow and the slightest bump sent it falling to the ground. Considered unassembling and mailing back, but repacking would’ve been next to impossible, so I broke out the drill and extra wood for support instead.
customer_reviews.author: jnet

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value! Only one complaint/issue...
customer_reviews.text: For my needs--installing lift springs--I had to drill holes in this frame. I understand that this is a custom application, but it might be nice if there were some universal holes predrilled for lift frames or other. The packaging is great! It even comes with a super cool allen ratchet. The slats were the best design I've seen--all connected with velcro, making it super easy to install. Incredible value! -Michael Lacey . me - Lacey Woodshop
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.  Easy to assemble.  Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed. Easy to assemble. Included the necessary wrench, clear instructions and two extra screws. This is being used in a four poster bed. This low profile design enabled me to remove the box spring and lower the mattress by 6 inches. Getting into and out of the bed are much easier. I strongly recommend this for the elderly and those who have issues transfering to or from the bed. My only regret is that I did not do this sooner. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shaver

customer_reviews.title: The mattress support you NEED!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new mattress a year and a half ago. I neglected to notice that I needed a sturdier foundation than what I had. Although my foundation was not old at all, the slats were spaced too far apart and I was waking up consistently with back pain. I reached out to the mattress company and they highly recommended that I purchase a bunkie board. I'd never heard of this product, so I started to search. I found this one and the price was perfect. I ordered it, got it very quickly, assembled it myself and even 'installed' it. Back pain is gone! Best hundred dollars I've spent in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Germain

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I bought the king size support frame and it was very easy to assemble. This was to replace the support on an Ikea bed. The bed I have is the Ikea MALM. The bed support was called the LEIRSUND or LONSET (not entirely sure which). The Ikea support was quite a contraption. This support is basic and solid. It fits perfectly, doesn't make a sound and is supportive. It doesn't attempt to provide a cushioning or spring like feel as the Ikea supports do.
customer_reviews.author: WFS

customer_reviews.title: Was not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: This is what you get for using the one click option on your phone without doing enough research. My son has a full size bunk bed under a twin. The support system broke after some jumping on it with friends. I figured I would just order this as a replacement however it was not wide enough... and is not eligible for return so buyer beware. It came fast and packaged really well... I just wish it was an inch or so wider so it could fit in the space. Now I will see if I can find a new home for it. Buyer Beware of return policy and measure twice.
customer_reviews.author: S. South

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought a queen size and its a couple inches short on each side. I had to still use the regular supports on the frame to hold it up. The frame slides around a little too so I used the foam that came in the box to keep it in place. Its a nice product and was easy to assemble but there needs to be a few adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wade

customer_reviews.title: Love this bunkie board!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. I measured my bed frame to make sure this bunkie board would fit (since I’ve read returns are not allowed). I bought the full size. It measures exactly as mentioned in the description. The frame and slats both have Velcro strips to prevent the slats from slipping. 2 slats also have a nonslip tape to prevent the top mattress from sliding. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: Needs quality control
customer_reviews.text: Well, bought this because my wife was concerned about mold accumulating on the bottom of the mattress. We have a king platform bed. So for the good: Easy to assemble, seems sturdy, serves its purpose. For the bad: Box arrived torn and open, once assembled frame is bent, when placed on platform, it rocks back and forth like a see saw. If the box wasn't so big and heavy, I would try to return, but don't want to lug it to the post office or to whatever carrier would take it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’d order again! I forgot to order the slats with my IKEA MALM bed. IKEA shipping takes a crazy long time bc of covid, so I tried furniture/mattress places but they can’t sell just the slats without a bed frame. These arrived in just a couple days. I did think it was going to take a long time to set up, but it actually only took about 10 minutes. It’s a quick and very easy set up. Comes with the screws (+ some extra), the ratchet, an allen wrench, and even cute little thank you cards to write for others. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and made, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the king sized bunkie board. I assembled it by myself in about 20 minutes. I had two nice surprises. First, the wooden slats are in two packs of six, with spacing straps on each end. That wasn't obvious to me when I ordered it, and it sure made installing the slats evenly a snap. Second, each slat is held in place by velcro. The support ledges on the side of the frame have velcro on them, and each slat has a velcro patch on each end. The result is the slats stay in place, and there is no squeaking when you use the bed. This has exceeded my expectations and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely saved me from buying a new bed frame!!! I accidentally ordered a panel bed instead of a platform bed for my memory foam mattress and this saved me so much headache!! The clearance was just thick enough for this frame to fit inside of the panel bed. Instant Platform bed! Super easy to put together and has velcro to hold the wooden slates in place so it doesn't move. I would definitely recommend this even if you're not looking to convert panel to a platform bed. It's also very lightweight so will be easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Kimheat

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my bed problem!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 5 year old daughter an organic bed that did not require a box spring. It was fine just on the frame for a while, but after some time it started falling through the frame. I bought this for her full bed and it works awesome! There is a little space between the frame and the insert, I just used some of the foam that came in the packing to fill the space and it does not move. Highly, highly recommend this and I put it together in 45 minutes, so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This fit my queen size sleigh bed perfect. I needed to replace my box springs because my bed was wsy too high for my 5'2" height. The assembly was so easy, my 13 year old grandson put it together! I love the velcro along the edge to hold slats in place. Comes with ratchet, screw bolts and 2 extra bolts. Packaging was neat and clean. No chios or dents, perfectly packed with plastic covered styrofoam blocks to keep from moving. So pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cary

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Ours was missing hardware kit
customer_reviews.text: If you have the opportunity to buy one of these at a discount that is missing the hardware kit, do it if it's more than $7. Ours was missing the kit (wasn't supposed to be), so I took one of the sides to Home Depot and matched up the right bolt size, I used M8-1.25 x 16 mm Stainless-Steel Flat Head Phillips Metric Machine Screws and they worked great, could get away with the 12mm ones if you want to save a buck or two also, or if they don't have enough you can also use 20mm as a backup. You'll need 8 bolts and a phillips head screwdriver to install them, nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This company goes above and beyond 🚀
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes building furniture can be a stressful, but Zinus makes sure that the construction is as painless and enjoyable as possible. When they say easy assembly, they mean it. All the parts are labeled with bright stickers match up to meet all connection points and make sure that it is the correct orientation. Zinus is incredibly thoughtful in every aspect of this product. They even include blank cards to send to your loved ones! I’m truly astounded will definitely be buying from this company again. 👍
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: As easy as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed base (King Size) to replace the two old single size box springs holding our new mattress. I have been assembling furniture at home for the last three weeks as we get new beds, dressers, etc. and this bed frame was far the easiest thing to put together. The measurements are a perfect fit for the existing base, the included tools are great, the fit of the part is spot on, and the slats are high quality. New the new mattress sits on a nice quiet sturdy base. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Daniel San

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!! Such easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: There are nothing but great things, for me, to say about the bunkie board. First off, assembly was easy and took me about 5-10 minutes to complete. The velcro wooden slats system is brilliant. Best of all...it fits perfectly right on top of my new 80" x 60" queen bed. It does a perfect job replacing an old style box spring. The bunkie currently fits on top the three wood support beams and the inner lip of all four sides of the bed frame. Any standard queen mattress can go right on top giving the mattress and bed that 'low profile' look that i just love. This gets the "Starter Andy Stamp of Approval (SASA)"!!!
customer_reviews.author: Starter Andy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and highly functional!
customer_reviews.text: This thing took less than 10 minutes to assemble. It came with all the required hardware and even a ratcheting allen wrench! It has bolts at the 4 corners and to secure the center support beam the wooden slats sit in the track of the frame nicely. No issues putting it together. Even better it replaced our bulky box spring. It was comfortable to sleep on, no squeaks or creaks. We have a foam mattress and it is a solid base for that... I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: c.bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This was brilliantly simple to put together with simple clear instructions and even a handy little ratchet to make the job even easier. I assembled it by myself in less than 10 minutes - maybe even closer to 5. The box was heavy and I had to get it upstairs, but I just carried up the pieces individually. It’s very sturdy and well constructed. This company needs to give IKEA and other companies some pointers on how to make furniture simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: W. Christner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble, Very Impressed With Zinus
customer_reviews.text: I bought the queen size bunkie board to go with the Zinus Andover bed instead of a box spring. The components were carefully packaged and labeled, making it easy to assemble. Zinus even included a ratchet wrench that made the job a breeze. This fits inside my bed frame with a little wiggle-room on each side and is very sturdy. The included thank you cards and easy-to-follow labeling and instructions make this a great company to purchase from. I am so impressed with Zinus and their products!
customer_reviews.author: linsey

customer_reviews.title: As shown
customer_reviews.text: I was unfortunate enough to get a mislabeled piece. One of the end pieces was backwards for 1 and two. Maybe 1.5 mm difference. Made it impossible to screw on correctly. It wasy only bed. So I threw it on my bed. It was making noises. A couple of weeks later. I was less tired from moving. I did take it apart and put it apart correctly. The Velcro is the noise now. I can live with that. But not Ideal. Seems sturdy enough. Once together right.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyMia

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, but size is off
customer_reviews.text: This was a strong and sturdy piece for a Full Bed Frame, but unfortunately the size isn't right. It's measured for a Full Bed Frame, but after I received it and put it together, I discovered it was slightly smaller than the Full Bed Frame. I had to return it. As far as quality, it is strong and looks good, but they should pull out that measuring tape before listing this incorrectly. Customer service was super nice though.
customer_reviews.author: K Dude

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!  Used with a metal bed frame and memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was very uncertain about this purchase based upon some reviews regarding sizing, but it ended up working perfectly. Assembly was incredibly easy and they gave you two different ratchets to use, plus extra screws in case they were short. The assembled frame fit perfectly into my standard queen size metal bed frame.. very snug, no movement. There was absolutely no movement to the bed, no matter how much I moved around and tried to rattle it. Perfect product, and much more convenient than a box spring, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Headley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought another bunky board on Amazon that didn't require assembly. This one was 10 bucks cheaper so when I needed another one I decided to try it out. Very easy to assemble so I would do it again. Every penny counts right? Bottom line, it meets my needs and took 10 minutes to put together, with less packaging to recycle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dearborn

customer_reviews.title: Quick solution to lower bed height
customer_reviews.text: When we had an elderly relative come to stay with us, we needed to lower the height of the bed. We got this bunkie board and removed the box springs. The bunkie board was easy to install and we've had no complaints about comfort. We have had many compliments on the better bed height, however. As mattresses are getting thicker and thicker over the years, this product will help you keep your bed at a reasonable height.
customer_reviews.author: anonnymouse

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This slat system is well designed for simplicity, and very sturdy. I was able to assemble it in just a few minutes. The pre-attached velcro strips help prevent slipping of mattress once in the frame. Well thought out plan!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: No more squeaky bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was hunting for an affordable solution to replace a 10+ year-old low-profile wooden box spring. With a fancy new mattress recently replaced on top of it, the poor box spring creaked and groaned with every movement in bed. It was so loud I figured the neighbors could hear when I rolled over. No more squeaks and moans with this replacement. And, I still get the low-profile bed for a clean, modern look. Super easy to assemble. And the bed feels more sturdy. Glad I decided to do this instead of just replacing the box spring!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, works great, only slight manufacturing defect in mine.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and works perfectly under my new memory foam mattress. The bed I had only had 3 horizontal slats and would not support the mattress alone without it sagging and eventually ruining the mattress. I needed some additional support that didn't add much height. This was the perfect solution. The only complaint is that one of the shorter end metal rods was bent slightly where you had to insert the longer side metal rod and I had to use pliers to bend back which wasn't as easy as it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Chasteen

customer_reviews.title: Fits great on my cheap metal frame, but slides.
customer_reviews.text: Got a new Nest bed, and couldn’t use the box spring (voided warranty: needed wood slats). Kept my old low metal frame, this fit just fine. Only problem I had was that the Deepak slides so easy on my metal frame (it has no ends). If I did it again, I would have put down some double stick tape. Since I didn’t want to pick everything back up, I just zip-tied the Deepak to the frame where you might attach a headboard. I wouldn’t recommend this product if there isn’t a center support rail on your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Great support and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward and easy to assemble. Might seem easy enough to go to the home improvement store and get wood to make a support like this yourself but this simplifies the effort, provides a great deal of support, especially combined with a boxed mattress. I am using with a metal framed day bed that was missing pieces. This is a perfect fit into the adjustable mattress frame I used on it.
customer_reviews.author: KW1014

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for the old base
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and it is exactly the same size as my mattress. People are saying it's too small, but it's exactly the right size. If they used a regular box spring, it would be too small for them as well because they are the same size! The only problem I had, and it was my own fault, is that it slides easily on a metal bed frame. A few strategically placed (large) zip ties, and I'm good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and functions well
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Easy to assemble and functions well, converting a conventional bed frame to a platform bed.
customer_reviews.author: dhprs

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly simple slats
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed them to do, fit on a bed frame that was a different brand with ease, and was super easy to assemble and install. Just get a hand carrying them inside if you have a bad back, as they are quite sturdy (read: heavy) in the delivery box. We are very thankful our mattress now has a proper support; it makes all the difference in how our mattress works for us. Overall, quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a floor mattress but need a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have a floor mattress but need a little ventilation underneath to avoid mold and mildew is humid areas. Used it as a floor bed for my toddler who still rolls out of bed and working out great. Easy assembly and high quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was easy for me, a smallish mom, to assemble & move by myself. It is being used on a full size IKEA bed with a zinus 12” green tea mattress without a box spring. It is comfortable & sturdy for my 15 year old, 6’ 160 lb son. I had it in storage for a while & despite me moving it around & wrapping & unwrapping the Velcro to store it the wood & Velcro remained like new.
customer_reviews.author: Striped

customer_reviews.title: Very good, and very good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nearly-perfect slat mattress support. My only complaint: the slats aren't curved like on some of the more expensive products (and not as many with closer spacing). So if it's used by a heavy person over several years, they're going to get curved. They don't seem intended to be reversible, but I'll try if it eventually seems like that would be necessary. Short story: I would've liked a bit better quality, but didn't want to pay a lot more money, so this product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: xgrep

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame, creaky boards
customer_reviews.text: The frame was easy to assemble, and the metal parts are quite study. However, the planks are barely 1/2" thick, which means they bend fairly easily under pressure. There's minimal creaking right now, but I'm not optimistic about how long that will last. And at least one is already quite creaky. 2 month update: Board has now become extremely creaky. I'm not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Queen is to small! Does not fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my ikea queen bed frame. Took a hour to put together. The screw holes were not threaded so had to use a drill to get them in. Once placed on my bed the frist thing that happend was it fell through the bed frame! This is not big enough to reach the sides that hold it up! Rediculous man I'm bout to stop buying from Amazon tired of these types of issues.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: The best option to get rid off your crappy box spring.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a European approach for bedding. I always hated those high, useless box springs which would collect the dust and bugs without the option of cleaning. This is a truly a healthy option which will provide the flexibility for your mattress to give you the best night sleep. All the tools and extra screws just makes this design worth it. It fits perfectly to my Potter Barn bed frame. Thank you! The best product purchase of 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The foundation came quickly, was so so so easy to put together, had clear instructions, and was packaged perfectly! Even came with some cute greeting cards and a free tool that made assembly easier. We love it and it fits perfectly into our IKEA bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Sandridge

customer_reviews.title: Lifts the bed up off the floor.
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that can lift our king bed off the floor but not break the bank or make it look like crap. As our little one would sleep, jump, and run on the bed, we needed something easy for him to get in and out. This lifted our bed, kept the moisture from accumulating, and prevented any big bonks from jumping or rolling to occur.
customer_reviews.author: Z Unger

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit!
customer_reviews.text: I would have been completely happy with it - had it fit inside the queen bed frame I have. An inch is like a mile when it comes to something like this. After hours of building the new bed, we put this together pretty quickly, and it doesn’t fit. I am extremely unhappy - moving is a pain in the a** anyway, and then to have this happen is just the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: A. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the full size. From unpacking to assembly and installation, it took me about 30-ish minutes. Parts are labeled well and instructions are super easy to follow. The kit even came with a ratchet to help torque down the bolts. The boards seem to be sturdy enough and are supported by a metal center piece. I bought this for my 78 year old mother who just had a hip replacement and needed her bed lowered. I am extremely please with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just measure
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was delayed by a day or two but after I got it, it was super easy to install. They even included a tool to make it go faster! I needed something smaller as an alternative to a box spring and this did just that. I left the bunkie board on top of the beds supports for added stability. I was concerned about it not fitting due to sizing issue others had, but I measured before purchase and it was exactly as stated. The bed is stable without noises and it is perfect for a box spring alternative.
customer_reviews.author: MR.RW

customer_reviews.title: Horrible is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: These slats destroyed my mattress and caused sagging on a brand new beautyrest pillow top. They did send me a replacement and it was no help whatsoever and it also took 6 weeks for a response. It's noisy and not worth the money at all. I now have to get a new ones because I can't take the back pain anymore and I pray my mattress isn't permanently going to feel this horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wood smells like dead fish-Returning!
customer_reviews.text: Stinks like fish. The moment I opened the box it reeked of dead fish. I immediately disposed of the packing materials down the trash chute. I cleaned every wood slat and metal support with lysol, then with febreeze, then with antimicrobial soap. The entire apartment now smells like dead fish. I’m sorry, I am returning this product. The smell is awful, like the wood has been soaked in dead fish.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gray

customer_reviews.title: Thank you !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure your bed frame to ensure a perfect fit ! Been browsing online for a few days, decided to take the plunge & purchase these slots for my queen bed. Box it comes in is a little heavy but once it’s put together, it’s easy for one person to life & place. Such an easy assembly & perfect fit ! My mattress feels completely supported !! If you’re searching, look no further !! Thank you Zinus !!! Will be recommending to friends & family !!!
customer_reviews.author: Neysa R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy convenient and complete
customer_reviews.text: Easy to figure out how to install. I did a dry assembly first to get the idea, then transported the parts to assemble for real at my daughter’s new place. The fit was perfect for the full size bed frame. Quality seems adequate. The wood slats were thinner than I expected, but with the number of them spreading the weight distribution, and the lengthwise metal support bar in the middle, I think this will last as long as it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's crib conversion to a full size headboard and baseboard came with with 4 4" wide slats to hold up a full size mattress. Obviously not ideal for such a heavy mattress so we ordered this to support the mattress without getting a box spring and make it even harder for her to get onto the bed. This worked perfectly and holds up our weight without worrying it'll break! Perfect platform base for a framed headboard and baseboard
customer_reviews.author: BYL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Five Year Old's Bed
customer_reviews.text: Instead of buying a new bed for our five year old transitioning out of a crib day bed, we converted it into a full size bed. We bought a metal bed frame and foam mattress from Walmart and used this bunkie board for the base instead of buying a base. This fit into the metal frame perfectly! The board was easy to assemble and came with it's own tool. It's exactly what I needed and was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Bunkie Works and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bunkie board ordered was for a kingsize mattress. The bunkie board was very easy to assemble and I (a woman) finished within about 30 minutes. I like the fact the boards are actually easy to line up using the velcro system. The slats, bolts, frame pieces and tools provided for the assembly were of quality and the directions easy to follow. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my child's platform bed after the old particle board broke from the kids being kids. This came in the mail in a large long box. It was packaged well with easy instructions. It took me about 15 minutes to put together with the tools provided in the box. It fit perfectly on the bed and is exactly what I needed for a great replacement. I would purchase another one if I had to and reccomend it to anyone who needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty The NJ Medium

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for stabilizing hybrid mattress
customer_reviews.text: This Zinus Deepak was purchased to replace box springs that were not suitable for a new memory foam/hybrid mattress. It was relatively easy to assemble, though cumbersome to move once assembled and somewhat heavy due to its size (King). It fit perfectly on my existing bed frame and supports the mattress exactly as needed. The price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: ds35

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my mattress company
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a new mattress online, which was not as firm as we would have liked. When speaking to customer service they recommended trying one of these instead of our box spring. This item was reasonably priced and easy to install and is noticeably firmer/more supportive for our latex mattress. Something to consider is that it does lower the height of the bed not using a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: GallopingGypsy

customer_reviews.title: Solved one problem, created another
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this product, it was easy to build and they provided the tools needed. It brought my high mattress back down to a comfortable height and that’s great however it creaks and clanks any time my husband or I move at night and also easily slides out of place. I’m guessing the metal framing of the product is not flush to the metal framing of the bed. Disappointed, hoping to find an all wood board to replace this with.
customer_reviews.author: Keny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good fit for queen frame
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought a queen sized bed frame after sleeping on just a mattress and box spring on the floor for 3 years. The frame made our bed WAY too high and we basically had to running jump/ hoist ourselves into it every night. Box spring added too much height. I researched the slats on Amazon and this one had the best reviews. It was quick to assemble and very sturdy, and now our bed is a normal height and we can actually fall into it again! No more climbing. It fit our queen frame perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: labyrinth

customer_reviews.title: Great for a full size bed and the mattress doesn't move
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help support the mattress on a bed that I purchased from Amazon. The bed I purchased separate from this couldn't support my son's mattress so I decided to buy this product and when it arrived it was quick and easy to put together and fit perfectly. I did measure the bed before I purchase this product. Worth the money and is very very sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: tonyala

customer_reviews.title: Easier than IKEA
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a problem putting IKEA furniture together. This is waaaay simpler than that. Everything is labeled and fits perfectly, the ratchet allen wrench and velcro slats are genius, and it's very lightweight. I put it together by myself in maybe 20 minutes. The longest part was getting everything out of the box. Hardest part was wrangling the queen mattress onto the bed alone.
customer_reviews.author: RFerguson

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my box spring
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am so angry. Recently I decided to take this off .Well, there is sticky tape to hold your box spring or mattress in place. Taking this off my bed ruined my box spring. It ripped the material . I want my money back but of course it is past the return date. Customer service is horrible. They got everything they needed from me then just stopped contact.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Well made - easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new mattress for a new bed and needed a thinner solution for a box spring. We have purchased several Zinus products before and have been pleased with the quality and ease of assembly. This bunkie board was better quality and less than half the price of the national brand offered to us at the mattress retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Mikesun

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in good shape, the contents were all protected, and unboxing was simple. The directions were easy to follow, and all it took to assemble was 8 bolts which an allen key AND a ratchet were provided for. The velcro on the frame and slats was a genius idea. I have had bed slats before that kick out because nothing secured them...velcro...who woulda thought! All in all this product is well worth it and I would recommend it to anyone looking for an alternative to box springs or a bunkie board.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE TO SIZE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo disappointed that this item is NOT a true king size bed support. Such a waste of money and time when I could’ve just gotten something that actually fits my bed...and my new mattresses arrive today and I STILL have to sleep on an air mattress since this does not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tia D.

product_meta.title: Zinus Deepak Easy Assembly Wood Slat 1.6 Inch Bunkie Board / Bed Slat Replacement, Full
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Design:Wood SlatThe Zinus 1.6 inch wood slat Bunkie board offers a slim, strong and sturdy foundation for your spring, memory foam, or Hybrid mattress. Made of premium steel and featuring wood slats, the Zinus Bunkie board provides ideal mattress support. Compact packaging allows for tight interior spaces such as stairs and hallways. Available in twin, Full, queen, and King, the Zinus Bunkie board will ensure long-lasting support and durability for your mattress. Another comfort innovation from Zinus.
feature_bullets: Strong and Sturdy 1.6 inch profile wood slat mattress support. Ideal for use with platform beds, bunk beds and daybeds
Fast and easy assembly with convenient and compact packaging
Offers additional support for spring, hybrid, and memory foam mattresses
Foam padded tape is added to the steel frame for noise-free use and non-slip tape on the wooden slats prevents your mattress from moving

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,053 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
